sentences.english: Seams in the anorthosite series are only intermittently exposed.
sentences.chinese: 斜长岩组中的矿层仅断续出露。

sentences.english: Alteration of similar nature is also reported in connection with the disseminations in layers and the massive nests .
sentences.chinese: 同样的馈变在浸染状矿层及块状矿巢中也都存在。

sentences.english: The ore bed hosts in boracic granulite of Lieryu formation, Liaohe group of lower proterozoic.
sentences.chinese: 矿层赋存于早元古界辽河群里尔峪组含硼变粒岩段。

sentences.english: The country possesses rich mineral deposits.
sentences.chinese: 这个国家拥有丰富的矿层。

sentences.english: The Main Chromitite Seam and the Merensky Reef do not outcrop well.
sentences.chinese: 主铬铁岩矿层及麦仑斯基矿层出露不好。

sentences.english: The Main Chromitite Seam and the Merensky Reef do not outcrop well.
sentences.chinese: 主铬铁岩矿层及麦仑斯基矿层出露不好。

sentences.english: Knowledge of the occurrence of chromite deposits is likewise incomplete.
sentences.chinese: 对于铬铁矿矿层产状的了解同样是不完整的。

sentences.english: It is the unsolidified sediment consisting of disordered kaolinite and small amount organic matter and lignite materials.
sentences.chinese: 常含少量有机质或与褐煤矿层等伴生。

sentences.english: Vanadium bearing stone coal of Guang Wang of Sichuan is more rich vanadium ore.
sentences.chinese: 四川广旺含钒石煤主矿层属品位较高较富的钒矿资源。

definition: variant of 岩層|岩层[yan2 ceng2]/rock strata
